msg: Wrong counter was used as the array index.

author: mrglavas
msg: For backwards compatibility, trim whitespace before passing a
system id to the URI class to read (when standard-uri-conformant

author: mrglavas
msg: White space characters aren't allowed to be in front of the
scheme portion of a URI even if they are escaped.

author: mrglavas
msg: Improve performance of getType. To determine if we're looking
at an enumerated type it is sufficient to check that the first char
is a '('. If it is a '(' then it cannot be anything else.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing Bug #24753. Patch submitted by Alex Milowski.
Allow Xerces to be built on Mac OS X with Apple JDK 1.4.
